title: Gift someone a lifetime of self improvement with Headway Premium, now under $50
content:
Macworld

Need a gift idea? Consider giving the gift of self-awareness and personal growth with Headway Premium, which doesn’t require any shipping (aka, no late gifts). Through December 25, you can grab a lifetime subscription to this self-improvement app for only $49.97 (reg. $299).

With Headway, users can enjoy personalized and bite-sized learning through its offering of 15-minute long summaries of best-selling non-fiction books. Users can read, listen, or watch these summaries to get a book’s key insights and ideas, and potentially dive deeper and read the entire book if they’re interested!

Once you’ve used Headway, the app can provide personalized recommendations and curated collections based on your preferences. Plus, there are fun motivators to keep you learning something new every day, including widgets and streaks.

Providing a user-friendly method for sustainable, daily learning and self-improvement, it’s no wonder Headway has over 20 million downloads worldwide, as well as accolades like “App of the Day” and the title of “Apple Editor’s Choice.” 

This holiday, give someone special a thoughtful gift designed to enrich their minds.

Grab a lifetime subscription to Headway Premium for just $49.97 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon required!
